detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract YearnBNBNetworkToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnBNBNetworkToken.sol#73-186) has payable functions:
	 - YearnBNBNetworkToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnBNBNetworkToken.sol#183-185)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
